description: Loans for SC/ST/women entrepreneurs to set up greenfield enterprise
eligibility: SC/ST or women entrepreneur, Greenfield enterprise, Age 18+, Business in manufacturing, services, or trading
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Business project report, Caste certificate
benefits: Up to 100L loan, 85% coverage by CGTMSE, Margin money 10-15%

description: Seed funding for eligible startups through incubators
eligibility: DPIIT registered
documentsRequired: Innovative business idea, Startup < 2 years old, Incorporated in India, PAN, Incorporation certificate, Pitch deck, Financial projections
benefits: Up to 50L seed funding, No collateral, 36 months repayment moratorium

eligibility: Valid MSME registration, Business vintage 2+ years, CGTMSE eligible
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, MSME registration certificate, Bank statements
benefits: Collateral-free up to 200L, 85% guarantee cover, Fast disbursement

description: Loans for non-corporate small business sector
eligibility: Non-corporate small business
documentsRequired: Need loan for income generating activity, Age above 18, PAN, Aadhaar, Bank statement, Business proof
benefits: Up to 10L loan, No collateral for Shishu loans, Fast processing

description: Funding for agriculture and rural startups
eligibility: Startups in agriculture, Rural areas, Innovative product/service, Age 18+
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Business plan, Environmental clearances
benefits: Up to 50L funding, Subsidized interest, Technical support

description: Comprehensive banking for startups with digital solutions

benefits: Up to 50L loan, Dedicated relationship manager, Special rates

eligibility: DPIIT registered startup, Business < 3 years, INR 50L+ annual revenue

benefits: Up to 50L loan, No prepayment charges, Business banking suite

eligibility: Valid MSME certificate, Business running 6+ months
documentsRequired: PAN, MSME registration, Bank statements
benefits: Up to 50L loan, CGTMSE coverage, Competitive rates

eligibility: Established supply chain, Vendor/Paymaster rating
documentsRequired: Supply chain docs
benefits: Up to 300Cr, Early payment discount, Digital platform

description: Generates employment by establishing micro-enterprises in rural and urban areas
eligibility: Age 18+, Business in manufacturing or services, New micro-enterprise, Education: 8th pass for rural, 10th pass for urban
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Educational certificates, Business project report, Proof of identity
benefits: Up to 50L for manufacturing, 20L for service units, Credit-linked subsidy 15-35% on project cost, No margin money for SC/ST/women

description: Quick digital approval for MSME loans through online portal
eligibility: Valid MSME registration (Udyam), Business vintage 6+ months, ITR filing, GST registration, Bank account
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, MSME registration certificate, ITR (2 years), GST certificate, Bank statements
benefits: In-principle approval within 59 minutes, Up to 5Cr loan, Digital process, Collateral-free up to 200L

description: Supports technology upgrades for MSMEs with capital subsidy
eligibility: Valid MSME registration, Manufacturing or service unit, Technology upgrade required, Loan from scheduled bank/NBFC
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, MSME certificate, Technology upgrade plan, Machinery quote, Bank loan approval
benefits: 15% capital subsidy on loans up to 1Cr for new machinery, Maximum subsidy 15L, Improves competitiveness

schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) - Home Loan
description: Government-linked housing scheme with interest subsidy for first-time homebuyers
eligibility: First-time homebuyer, Annual household income: EWS/LIG/MIG-I/MIG-II categories, Not owning pucca house, Aadhaar linked
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Income certificate, Property documents
benefits: Interest subsidy up to 2.67L (EWS/LIG), 2.35L (MIG-I), 1.12L (MIG-II), Up to 30 years tenure

description: Loans for higher education in India covering tuition fees and expenses
eligibility: Admission to recognized college/university, Co-applicant required, Age 18-35 years, Indian citizen
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Admission letter, Fee structure, Co-applicant documents
benefits: Up to 50L, Moratorium period (course + 6 months), Tax benefits, Collateral-free up to 7.5L

description: Loans for studies abroad covering tuition
documentsRequired: 150.00, Admission to top international universities, Good academic record, Co-applicant mandatory, Age 18-35, PAN, Passport, Admission letter, Visa, Co-applicant proof
benefits: Up to 150L, Moratorium (course + 1 year), No prepayment charges, Collateral for higher amounts

description: Unsecured loans for personal needs like medical emergencies
documentsRequired: 30.00, Age 21-60 years, Salaried or self-employed, Minimum income 15K/month (salaried), Good credit score (700+), PAN, Aadhaar, Salary slips (3M) or ITR, Bank statements (6M)
benefits: Quick disbursement, Up to 30L, No collateral, Flexible tenure up to 5 years

description: Financing for purchasing new passenger vehicles
eligibility: Age 21-65 years, Regular income source, Valid driving license, Vehicle invoice
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Income proof, Driving license, Vehicle invoice
benefits: Up to 50L, 85-90% financing, Flexible tenure up to 7 years, Quick approval

description: Financing for pre-owned vehicles with flexible terms
eligibility: Age 21-65 years, Income proof, Driving license, Vehicle registration, Age of vehicle < 5 years
documentsRequired: PAN, Aadhaar, Income documents, RC book, Vehicle inspection report
benefits: Up to 25L, Up to 85% financing, Tenure up to 5 years
